Can I have a piece of cake?: She had a thought about the project. He thought about his answer before responding.
She has a thousand followers on social media. He spent a thousand dollars on his new phone.
She received a threat from an anonymous caller. He felt threatened by the aggressive behavior.
She has three dogs. He needs to buy three tickets.
She walked through the park. He read through the entire book.
She threw the ball to him. He needs to throw away the trash.
She studied hard and thus passed the test. He made a mistake
She bought a ticket for the concert. He needs to show his ticket to enter the theater.
She tied her hair back. He needs to tie his shoes.
She doesn't have time for a break. He needs to be on time for the meeting.
She left a generous tip for the waiter. He wants to give a tip on how to improve the project.
She needs to change the tire on her car. He is tired after a long day at work.
She wrote the title of the book on the cover. He has a new job title.
She is going to the park. He wants to talk to his boss.
She is busy with work today. He wants to learn about the technology of today.
She and her friends went to the party together. He needs to work together with his colleagues.
She has a meeting tomorrow. He is excited about tomorrow's event.
She is staying in tonight. He has plans to go out tonight.
She likes sushi too. He ate too much for lunch.
She needs a tool to fix the broken chair. He has a set of tools in his garage.
She needs to brush her teeth. He has a toothache.
She reached the top of the mountain. He wore a top hat to the party.
She introduced the topic of the meeting. He wants to discuss a different topic.
She calculated the total cost of the project. He wants to total the numbers on the spreadsheet.
She touched the soft fabric. He felt a touch of warmth.
She walked toward the beach. He has a positive attitude toward the project.
She grew up in a small town. He likes to visit different towns.
She made a trade with her friend. He works in the trade industry.
She got stuck in traffic on the way to work. He studies traffic patterns in the city.
She took the train to the city. He needs to train new employees.
She received training for her new job. He wants to attend a training session.
She transferred the money to his account. He wants to transfer to a different department.
She uses public transportation to get to work. He works in the transportation industry.
She loves to travel to new places. He needs to book his travel arrangements.
She treated her guests to dinner. He received a special treat for his birthday.
She climbed the tree to pick an apple. He planted a tree in his backyard.
She attended the trial as a witness. He ran a trial of the new software.
She took a trip to Europe. He tripped on the sidewalk.
She had trouble with her car. He doesn't want to trouble his friends.
She told him the true story. He wants to find true love.
She trusts her best friend. He needs to earn their trust.
She told him the truth about what happened. He wants to know the truth.
She wants to try the new restaurant. He will try his best to finish the project.
She squeezed toothpaste from the tube. He watched a video on the YouTube.
She hummed a tune from her favorite song. He needs to tune the guitar.
She took a turn driving. He wants to turn the page.
She has twelve cupcakes. He needs to be at the meeting at twelve o'clock.
She has twenty dollars in her wallet. He needs to buy twenty pencils.
She went to the gym twice this week. He wants to double-check his work twice before submitting it.
She has a twin sister. He bought a twin bed for the guest room.
She twisted her ankle while running. He likes movies with a twist ending.
She has two cats. He needs to buy two tickets for the movie.
She likes to read different types of books. He needs to type up his report.
She visited her uncle in the hospital. He has an uncle who lives in another country.
She found her keys under the couch. He needs to go under the bridge to get to the other side.
She understands the instructions. He wants to understand the problem better.
She completed the first unit of the course. He works in the marketing unit.
She graduated from the university last year. He is a professor at the university.
She won't go to the party unless her friend goes. He won't be able to finish the project unless he gets help.
She waited until he arrived. He needs to work until the deadline.
She climbed up the stairs. He lives up the street.
She stumbled upon a hidden treasure. He will act upon their advice.
She likes to use natural products. He has a practical use for the item.
She followed her usual routine. He arrived at his usual time.
She is planning her vacation for the summer. He wants to take a vacation to a tropical destination.
She knows the value of hard work. He wants to value their friendship.

一個: 各種各樣的，多種多樣的
Can I have a piece of cake?: She tried various flavors of ice cream. He has various responsibilities at work.
She likes to eat vegetables with her meals. He grows his own vegetables in his garden.
She owns a vehicle for transportation. He works in the vehicle manufacturing industry.
She is very happy with the results. He is very tired after a long day.
She celebrated her team's victory. He worked hard for the victory.
She watched a video on YouTube. He wants to make a video of his vacation.
She enjoyed the view from the top of the mountain. He wants to view the report before submitting it.
She grew up in a small village. He wants to visit a traditional village.
She wants to visit her grandparents. He had a visit from his friend.
She recognized his voice on the phone. He wants to voice his opinion.
She exercised her right to vote. He wants to vote for his favorite candidate.
She used a wagon to carry the heavy boxes. He played with a toy wagon as a child.
She waited for her friend to arrive. He doesn't want to wait in line.
She likes to walk in the park. He took a walk after dinner.
She hung a picture on the wall. He wants to paint the wall a different color.
She wants a new car. He wants to finish the project on time.
She studied the history of the war. He wants to promote peace instead of war.
She put on a warm sweater. He wants to warm his hands by the fire.
She needs to wash her clothes. He gave the car a wash.
She tries not to waste food. He wants to reduce waste in the environment.
She likes to watch movies in her free time. He checks his watch to see the time.
She drinks water every day. He needs to water the plants.
She watched the waves crash on the shore. He waved goodbye to his friend.
She found a new way to solve the problem. He took a different way home.
She and I are going to the park. He and his friends are planning a trip.
She felt weak after being sick. He doesn't want to appear weak in front of his colleagues.
She inherited a great wealth from her grandmother. He believes in the wealth of knowledge.
She likes to wear comfortable clothes. He needs to wear a suit to the meeting.
She checked the weather forecast before going out. He enjoys talking about the weather.
She found the information on the web. He wants to create a web page.
She attended her friend's wedding. He is planning his wedding.
She has a busy week ahead. He likes to plan his week in advance.
She checked her weight on the scale. He wants to lose some weight.
She welcomed her guests to the party. He received a warm welcome from his new colleagues.
She speaks Spanish well. He drank water from the well.
She watched the sunset in the west. He wants to visit the western part of the country.
She asked him what he wanted to eat. He wants to know what time the meeting starts.
She rode her bike with training wheels. He needs to wheel the cart to the storage room.
She asked when the concert starts. He wants to know when they can meet.
She asked where the bathroom is. He wants to know where they are going.
She asked whether he is coming to the party. He wants to know whether the project is on schedule.
She asked which dress he likes better. He needs to decide which option is best.
She listened to music while studying. He wants to take a break for a while.
She wore a white dress to the party. He prefers to drink white wine.
She asked who is coming to the meeting. He wants to know who won the game.
She ate the whole pizza by herself. He wants to improve the whole system.
She asked why he was late. He wants to understand why the project failed.
She walked on the wide sidewalk. He has a wide range of interests.
She is his loving wife. He wants to surprise his wife with a gift.
She saw a wild animal in the forest. He likes to go on wild adventures.
She will go to the gym later. He will work hard to achieve his goals.
She wants to win the game. He celebrated his team's win.
She felt the wind in her hair. He wants to wind up the clock.
She opened the window for fresh air. He looked out the window.
She likes to drink red wine with her dinner. He bought a bottle of wine for the party.
She likes to ski in the winter. He doesn't like driving in the winter.
She made a wise decision. He wants to be seen as a wise leader.
She wished for a happy ending. He sent his best wishes to his friend.
She went to the park with her friends. He wrote the letter with a pen.
She can't cook without a recipe. He wants to go without any distractions.
She is a strong woman. He respects women.
She wonders what will happen next. He witnessed a wonder of nature.
She likes the smell of fresh wood. He went for a walk in the woods.
She learned a new word today. He wants to keep his word.
She has a lot of work to do. He works hard to achieve his goals.
She wants to travel the world. He believes in a better world.
She worries about her future. He doesn't want to cause any worry.
She thinks the book is worth reading. He wants to know the worth of the property.
She would like to go to the beach. He would help if he could.
She likes to write in her journal. He needs to write a report.
She realized she was wrong. He went to the wrong address.
She likes to relax in her yard. He needs to clean up the yard.
She is excited for the new year. He wants to plan for the upcoming year.
She wore a yellow dress to the party. He likes to eat yellow fruits.
She said yes to the proposal. He gave a firm yes to the offer.
She went to the mall yesterday. He finished the project yesterday.
She hasn't finished the book yet. He wants to know if the package has arrived yet.
She is talking to you. He wants to thank you for your help.
She is a young and talented artist. He remembers his young days.
She likes your new haircut. He wants to borrow your book.
She returned your book. He likes your car
She can take care of herself. He wants you to take care of yourself.
